parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the middle drive shaft can cause the rear wheel to lock up, leading to loss of control and potentially resulting in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: sudden loss of power or control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the starter motor can cause the engine to not turn over, leaving the rider stranded, and potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The starter motor does not turn over the engine
the starter motor turns over but the engine does not start

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the speedometer can cause the rider to lose track of their speed, potentially leading to accidents or traffic violations.
symptoms: the speedometer needle is stuck or erratic.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the drive shaft retaining nut can cause the speedometer to stop working, and potentially lead to more serious mechanical issues if left unaddressed.
symptoms: the drive shaft retaining nut is loose

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the middle gear set can cause loud noises, rattling, and vibrations while decelerating or driving, which can lead to loss of control, accidents, or damage to other components.
symptoms: especially when the engine is not under load
